hero.intro: I'm a software engineer and I build user focused web tools and applications. My current focus is on bringing theming and internationalization to an eclectic group of projects.

landingIntro.about: My current work is foucused around user centered UX/UI design front-end implementation. On the side, I'm building my knowledge base around all things web development, Japanese, Korean, and more.
landingIntro.header: I'm a multi-passionate creator focusing on development, language learning, & a few other things

landingFeatured.description: Sajeon is a simple, easy to use Korean & English dictionary aimed at making simple Korean or English word lookups quick, intuitive and clean. Further iterations of the dictionary aim to improve search, design, and additional language data like parts of speech and learning level.

experiences: Integrated API for internal client form submissions and implemented submission flow UI - mobile first design.
Built a starter application for rapid prototyping  of web apps; generated sample landing and submission pages.
Created custom web-components with StencilJS, built to spec including test coverage at a 80% threshold.
Lead a team of developers to customize a react-mui compononet library style schema for design system alignment.
jobs.title: Front End Software Engineer

experiences: Developed, lead, and taught English education curriculum & US culture for 11 schools.
jobs.title: English Teacher

experiences: Built a full stack, data sending, web application tool for the developer team using Django, Python, HTML, CSS and JS.
jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern

experiences: Produced over $500,000 in sales within the first three quarters and maintained a 98% promoter score.
jobs.title: Specialist
